profile:
We are professional concrete contractors who provide quality home improvement work. From upkeep and preventative maintenance to masonry, restoration and repairs, we correct a wide range of cosmetic and structural problems. 

At M Scott Home Improvements we provide professional, quality home improvement work. Our focus is to provide dependable, honest service for our customers. We pride ourselves on our integrity and cleanliness and strive for complete customer satisfaction.

We have a Bobcat and mini excavator service with our own disposal bins. Not being dependent on subcontracts allows us to maintain a high level of quality and keep projects on schedule.

Contact M Scott Home Improvements today to arrange a free estimate and consultation.

Our services include:
* Waterproofing
* Concrete Contractors
* Brick Replacement and Restoration
* Masonry Repairs and Maintenance
* Basements Lowered
* Driveways
* Garage Floors
* Sidewalks
* Tuckpointing
* Chimneys
* Drains
* Foundation Repairs
* Weeping Tile Installation
* Window Wells
name: M Scott Home Improvements

profile:
Sprayman Group Installs Commercial & Industrial Interior Flooring Services - The Sprayman Group provides unique flooring protection, renewal and maintenance options resulting in high-quality, attractive and durable finishes.

Sprayman repairs concrete decks, floors, sidewalks, steps and foundations.  We also offer concrete grinding and concrete polishing for all of our residential and commercial customers.

We will contact you within 24 hours of receiving your request.
services:
Concrete repairs; decks, floors, sidewalks, steps and foundations.

Epoxy-type floor coatings for garages, basements, porches, stairs, as well as industrial and commercial settings

Asphalt repairs; cracks, potholes, sealing, line painting, driveway curb repairs (where asphalt meets garage curb), catch basin repairs.
name: Sprayman Group
